text: Charlie Herbert Rose (19 March 1872–1949) was an English footballer who played in the Football League for Derby County and Loughborough. ==References== Category:1872 births Category:1949 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:English Football League players Category:Derby St Luke's F.C. players Category:Derby Midland F.C. players Category:Derby County F.C. players Category:Kettering Town F.C. players Category:Ilkeston Town F.C. title: Charlie Rose (footballer)
